name: Time Group Analysis
descr: Proposed by D. Gibbon, Time Group Analyzer calculates mean, median, nPVI, slope and intercept functions within inter-pausal groups. Requires time aligned syllables.

options.text: Use the original estimation of intercept and slope
Use the estimation of intercept and slope proposed in AnnotationPro
Prefix of each time group label:
Duration estimation: Use 0 to estimate syllable durations with midpoint values, use -1 for Radius-, or 1 for Radius+.
